```{r libraries}
library(ROCR)
```

## Load data

```{r load_data}
data_file <- "~/Downloads/simulated_dataset.csv"

sim_data <- read.csv(data_file)
print(sprintf("Read %d data points.", nrow(sim_data)))

# sim_data <- sim_data[sample(1:nrow(sim_data)), ] # scramble the row order

sim_data |> head()

pred <- with(sim_data, prediction(score, label))
perf <- performance(pred, "tpr", "fpr")
plot(perf)
```
